message.body: Hello
Hi Hodara!
Hello
What part of the world are you in? I'm in Brooklyn, NY
I am in Somerville, outside of boston
How's the weather in Brooklyn
Looks grayish out, but seems warm
By you?
Same here
So how do you work?
I work from home - I'm a writer
You?
Ohh, so how did you get involve with the study?
A friend thought I'd enjoy it & sent me the info. You?
My sister told me about it
Neat! what do you do for a living?
I work as a research assistant at a hospital
Nice!
Do you have anything in particular you enjoy writing about?
Research is important! I was in an asthma study last year
That's great, it is very important :)
Yep. I have 4 subject-specific blogs, a Dreamwidth account, and a LiveJournal account. I write about food, grammar, knitting, and debt recovery/getting o
rganized, and I also do articles for a client on all sorts of things
And I also do editing for a small press
What kind of research do you do?
That seems so interesting! Lots of different topics. Are you good at knitting, I can only make a scarf but my co worker knits socks and hats. They are great
I've been knitting forever - about 55 years - I love knitting socks & lace shawls
Are you a reader? (I read anything that doesn't run away fast enough)
I work with patients over the age of 70 and undergoing surgery.
We are looking to see if changes in memory and thinking are caused by surgery
Haha, unfortunately I haven't had much time to read lately. I work full time and am taking some post baccalaureate courses. so my reading consists of textbooks
Ah - been there & not all that long ago - went back to college in 2000; got my BS, Bus. Mgmt in 2005
So you know how it is. But it's definitely worth it!
Education is *always* worth it, bubbeleh!
